title: Tai
description: This special bikini set is made from a silky material. These Brazilian bikini bottoms have knotted detailing at the front, thick straps, and a ruched cheeky cut.

title: Donna
description: The DONNA bottom is an ultra-flattering bikini bottom with a ruched design, adjustable front coverage, and tie details on each side.

title: Emi

title: Mulan
description: This classy one-piece is summerâ€™s hottest swimsuit! Featuring a body-baring brazilian style bottom and a flattering ruched silhouette designed to compliment every shape. This swimsuit has an adjustable high-cut leg elongating your figure for a flattering fit and adjustable thin straps transforming it to a bandeau style!

title: Jade
description: The JADE one piece is a vacation essential! This one-piece has halter neck straps which can be tied in the front for tanning and tie details on both sides with gold finishes. It features a bandeau-style top, and the swimsuit body has a cut-out - perfect to show off your figure!

Girls, watch out! This is the AMBER one-piece, it has halter neck straps which can be tied in the front making it perfect for your tanning needs. The underwire cups are supportive and flattering, the one piece has a subtle but sexy ruching design.
title: Amber
